how.title: How to start
how.step1Text: Register with your email and set your blog name and address (subdomain).
how.step2Text: Write in Markdown, add products, and embed product cards in your posts.
how.step3Text: Share your blog URL and connect a payment provider to accept orders.

showcase.title: Made with Sellog
showcase.subtitle: Many blogs are already running on Sellog.

testimonial.title: What people say
testimonial.quote1: Managing my blog and store in one place made everything simpler. SEO is well taken care of.
testimonial.quote2: Being able to start a blog and sell without coding kept the barrier low.

faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.q1: How do I create a blog with Sellog?
faq.a1: Sign up for free, then enter a subdomain (e.g. myblog) and blog name in the blog setup. You can write posts and add products from your blog dashboard.
faq.q2: Do I need to code to build my website?
faq.a2: No. Sellog is designed so you can run your blog and products without coding. Write posts in Markdown and add products through the form.
faq.a3: You can start for free. Sign-up, blog creation, posts, and products are free. Payment provider (PG) fees may apply when you connect one. Paid plans will be announced later.
faq.q4: Can I use my own (custom) domain?
faq.a4: Yes. Enter your custom domain in blog settings and point DNS as instructed. Your blog will be available at your domain.
faq.q5: Is it good for search engines?
faq.a5: Yes. All pages are server-rendered (Next.js) with meta tags, Open Graph, sitemap, and robots.txt set up automatically.
faq.a6: Checkout and order storage are built in. Connect a payment provider (e.g. Stripe) to accept payments. See the docs for integration.
